creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a Black couple on a couch; man has his arm around woman and holds her PL wrist with his PR hand; woman touches man's chin with one finger; picture with Jesus and sheep, and a relief panel with two figures, on wall above couch
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: [Couple on couch]
